channel.title: Make chest give reward
channel.description:
how do i make it so...
when a player uses a bone key (4272) on a chest (75) it makes you do the emote (setAnimation(422);)
and it gives 100k, and says congratz you got 100k,
and if you dont have the bone key it says,
"this chest requires a bone key to unlock"
and after you use the key on the chest the key gets deleted from there inventory.
thanks to who ever helps, i greatly appreciate it. and im using hiyascape as my source.

item.title: Make chest give reward
item.dc:creator: @kexion kexion
item.description:
@kexion wrote:

how do i make it so…

when a player uses a bone key (4272) on a chest (75) it makes you do the emote (setAnimation(422)

and it gives 100k, and says congratz you got 100k,

and if you dont have the bone key it says,

“this chest requires a bone key to unlock”

and after you use the key on the chest the key gets deleted from there inventory.

thanks to who ever helps, i greatly appreciate it. and im using hiyascape as my source.
